universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Interface Widget

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WidgetGroup
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionButton, ActionTextButton, AutoCompleteTextViewWidget, BaseProgressBar, ButtonWidget, CalendarView, CheckBoxWidget, CircularNumberPicker, CircularProgressBar, EditLayout, EditTextWidget, EmptyView, FlatButton, FloatingActionButton, FrameLayoutWidget, GridViewWidget, HorizontalScrollViewWidget, ImageButtonWidget, ImageViewWidget, InputLayout, LinearLayoutWidget, LinearProgressBar, ListViewWidget, MonthView, ProgressBarWidget, RadioButtonWidget, RecyclerViewWidget, RelativeLayoutWidget, ScrollViewWidget, SearchView, SeekBarWidget, SpinnerLayout, SpinnerWidget, SwitchWidget, TextViewWidget, ToggleButtonWidget, ViewPagerWidget, ViewWidget, WebViewWidget

    public interface Widget
    Interface for the widgets presented within the UI library.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Widget.BackgroundTintInfo
      This class holds base data necessary to tint components and background of a particular widget.
      static class  Widget.TintInfo
      This class holds base data necessary to tint components of a particular widget.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean ANIMABLE
      Flag indicating whether the widgets can use new animation API introduced in ICE_CREAM_SANDWICH to animate theirs properties.
